channel.title: Running my Server...?
channel.description:
Help please, I've portforwarded I just can't login :P Look, and help please
[code]Server Online Connection from darrell-PC.gateway.2wire.net:52217 Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:168) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8041) at client.run(client.java:16343) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (darrell-PC.gateway.2wire.net) Connection from darrell-PC.gateway.2wire.net:52217 Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:168) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8041) at client.run(client.java:16343) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (darrell-PC.gateway.2wire.net) Connection from darrell-PC.gateway.2wire.net:52217 Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:168) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8041) at client.run(client.java:16343) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (darrell-PC.gateway.2wire.net) [/code] I get this error in my server run prompt when I try to login.
I have ports open server on in no-ip and I still can't login :(
[img]http://i34.tinypic.com/27wx63p.jpg[/img]
Help is greatly appreciated! Please

item.title: Running my Server...?
item.dc:creator: @awesomeness1212 awesomeness1212
item.description:
@awesomeness1212 wrote:

you have the same exact problem as me except my port isnt open, even though i did open it

Read full topic

item.title: Running my Server...?
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

Editt:

Delete the port and make a new 1.

lol, most people use 55555 or 43594.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Editt wrote:

Delete the port and make a new 1.

item.title: Running my Server...?
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“Keegan_, post:3, topic:313172”][quote author=xxlukexx link=topic=409680.msg3023036#msg3023036 date=1257710573]
you need to use either:

0.0.0.0
localhost
127.0.0.1

your players will use the ip that you made.
[/quote]

Wait so. The client I use on my computer will have 127.0.0.1 but when I release I change the 127.0.0.1 in my released client to multi-unlimited.no-ip.biz?

Nobody actually ever explained this to me :P[/quote]

in your client, change the ip in gui.java to your ip that you made.

im not entirely sure, but iv tryed it befor and i can connect with the ip.
if not, then upload the client for your players with the ip in and then change the ip in YOUR client to 0.0.0.0

Read full topic

item.title: Running my Server...?
item.dc:creator: @Keegan1 Keegan_
item.description:
@Keegan1 wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:2, topic:313172”]you need to use either:

0.0.0.0
localhost
127.0.0.1

your players will use the ip that you made.[/quote]

Wait so. The client I use on my computer will have 127.0.0.1 but when I release I change the 127.0.0.1 in my released client to multi-unlimited.no-ip.biz?

Nobody actually ever explained this to me
